reviewText: Il Divo is the best singing group around.  Their voices blend like no other group.  And they are neat, well groomed, and well dressed.  They respond to the audience in a mature way.  I have all their cds, but my husband and I will take an evening and watch this video with great joy.
It was disappointing. Very short lost of songs, and lacking the usual "Il Divo" oomphah. I love their performances, live or CD, where they sing in different languages.
I will listen to anything this group delivers!  Their music is beautifully arranged and their voices are just awesome.  What talent they have!
A LET DOWN  IF THIS HAD BEEN THE FIRST ALBUM OR RECORDING I LISINTED TO I WOULD NOT HAVE BOUGHT ANOTHER

We absolutely love Il Divo!  We were so excited to receive this DVD.  We got the popcorn and chocolate and prepared to watch a great DVD.  Il Divo is wonderful but they cheated a little on this one.  They only perform 4 songs.  We felt slightly jipped!
